<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist"></a>

# AudioStreamPlaylist

**Inherits:** [AudioStream](class_audiostream.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

[AudioStream](class_audiostream.md) that includes sub-streams and plays them back like a playlist.

<!-- classref-constant -->

**MAX_STREAMS** = `64` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_constant_MAX_STREAMS)

Maximum amount of streams supported in the playlist.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_fade_time"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **fade_time** = `0.3` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_fade_time)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_fade_time**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_fade_time**\ (\ )

Fade time used when a stream ends, when going to the next one. Streams are expected to have an extra bit of audio after the end to help with fading.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_loop"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **loop** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_loop)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_loop**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **has_loop**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the playlist will loop, otherwise the playlist will end when the last stream is finished.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_shuffle"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **shuffle** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_shuffle)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shuffle**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **get_shuffle**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the playlist will shuffle each time playback starts and each time it loops.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_stream_count"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **stream_count** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_property_stream_count)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stream_count**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_stream_count**\ (\ )

Amount of streams in the playlist.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_get_bpm"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_bpm**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_get_bpm)

Returns the BPM of the playlist, which can vary depending on the clip being played.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_get_list_stream"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[AudioStream](class_audiostream.md) **get_list_stream**\ (\ stream_index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_get_list_stream)

Returns the stream at playback position index.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_set_list_stream"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_list_stream**\ (\ stream_index\: [int](class_int.md), audio_stream\: [AudioStream](class_audiostream.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioStreamPlaylist_method_set_list_stream)

Sets the stream at playback position index.
